## Export to Cytoscape

```{r eval = FALSE}
# link communities
mc_edge = as_edgelist(g)
mc_edge = data.frame(node1 = mc_edge[,1], node2 = mc_edge[,2], weight = E(g)$weight)
linkcomm_edgelist = g_linkcomm$edges
write.table(merge(mc_edge,linkcomm_edgelist,by=c("node1","node2")), file="~/Documents/git/Teaching/DataIntegration/data/graph.txt", sep = "\t", quote = F, col.names=T, row.names = F)
```
